short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely isolate web pages with Browsolate, a self-hosted browser isolation solution. (https://www.browsolate.com)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure Your Web Experience with Browsolate!

Transform the way you browse with **Browsolate** â€” your ultimate solution for secure, remote, and self-hosted web content access.

The **Browsolate extension** seamlessly integrates with your browser, empowering you to isolate and interact with content on your terms. Safeguard your browsing by isolating sites, URLs, and file types, all within a controlled, secure environment. Perfect for protecting your data, maintaining privacy, and enhancing online safety.

Take control of your browsing experience with **Browsolate** today!

---

## Advanced Features for Total Control

- **Policy-Based Isolation**: Automatically isolate specific URLs based on customizable policies. Easily define rules for content, domains, and file types to ensure sensitive browsing is always handled securely.  
- **On-Demand Instance Isolation**: Need to isolate a link on the fly? Right-click any link to instantly open it in a secure, isolated environment, giving you ultimate flexibility and peace of mind.
